function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Hospital-acquired infections due to airborne chemical and microbiological pollutants","Impact":"Risk of patient and health care worker infections, leading to worsened health outcomes and increased healthcare costs","Mitigation":"Implement effective contaminant mitigation and removal processes","Technologies":"Mechanical ventilation, filtration, differential pressure control, directional airflow control, ultraviolet germicidal irradiation (UVGI)","People":"Patients, health care workers","Owner":"Hospital management"},{"Description":"Poor indoor air quality leading to occupational diseases among health care workers","Impact":"Reduced health and well-being of health care workers, increased absenteeism, and healthcare costs","Mitigation":"Implementation of appropriate engineering designs and processes, use of mechanical ventilation, filtration, and UVGI","Technologies":"Mechanical ventilation, filtration, directional airflow control, ultraviolet germicidal irradiation (UVGI)","People":"Health care workers","Owner":"Hospital management"},{"Description":"Inadequate outdoor air quality leading to the ingress of pollutants into the indoor environment","Impact":"Risk of exposure to outdoor air pollutants, leading to compromised indoor air quality","Mitigation":"Treatment of outdoor air before it enters the indoor environment, use of outdoor air change rates based on minimum standards","Technologies":"Outdoor air treatment systems, air change rate control systems","People":"Occupants of the hospital facilities","Owner":"Hospital management"}]}
